attributes.action: VACCINATE NOW AGAINST FOOT AND MOUTH DISEASE
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
DEFRA manufactures and supplies Foot and Mouth Disease vaccine to the World, DEFRA can sequence the Virus and tell us where (which farm)it has come from to arrive in Surrey,it can do this in just a few weeks

Do not repeat the collossal avoidable mistakes of 2001  VACINATE NOW, do not delay this very important, but simple step.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
